ai-ne15:3.1_0: “About the elements,” and the formless realm.
ai-ne15:3.4_0: These five faculties are still not a trainee.
ai-ne15:4.1_0: Their five faculties cease without anything left over. When ignorance ceases, choices cease. When consciousness ceases, consciousness ceases. When name and form cease, name and form cease. When name and form cease, the six sense fields cease. When the six sense fields cease, contact ceases. When feeling ceases, craving ceases. When craving ceases, grasping ceases. When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases. When continued existence ceases, rebirth ceases. When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
ai-ne15:4.2_0: and so there is a cessation of this whole mass of suffering.

ai-ne15:25.4_0: When the body is tranquil, one understands it. They truly understand that they’re immersed in samādhi. They’re freed, joyful, and liberated. And they understand: “ their mind is freed from defilements”, the spiritual life is ended, and the complete ending of defilements.
